section.title_desc: Build a customized experience that is unique to you

section_content.text: With Canfone TV you build upon a great selection of base channels by adding custom packages to acheive that perfect mix of streaming content.
Canfone TV requires a minimum 15 Mbps Interent package, so choose your Canfone Internet option accordingly ;)

section.title_desc: We've got you covered when it comes to phones
section.section_desc: Make the move to Canfone for reliable, crystal clear phone service.

section_content.text: Add features like Voicemail, Call Display, Call Waiting and more
